articles.title: John Travolta posts emotional message thanking his fans for their support following his wife's death - CNN
articles.description: John Travolta took to social media to share a Thanksgiving message with his fans, thanking them for their support following the death of his wife.

articles.description: In an intimate new snap taken by the supermodel's mother Yolanda Hadid, the star can be seen sitting down and tenderly giving  her two-month-old a kiss on the cheek.
articles.content:
